availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen C. Hutchison (Lawrence County Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Married to Eliza S. Bussey Hutchison on July 13, 1860. Justice of the Peace in Lawrence County in 1864.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 86. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #unknown, Lawrence County Marriages, p. unknown. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Louisa, p. 183. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Lawrence County, KY, October 1863, p. 175, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
